name: Guitar Boss
description:
Rhytmh videogame.
A Guitar Hero based game located in Bogota-Colombia.
Becoming an urban musician of public transportation is not so easy, because you have to fight against the weather, the traffic, the noise, the crowds and just for few coins.

Controls:
E: press this key when the bus stop
F1 F2 F3 F4: play the guitar
W-S: character movement
Esc: pause game

Developed by Belceboss
Erika Rodriguez
Oscar Jimenez
Cristian Morales
Joanse Castillo
Andres Novoa
(This videogame is a grade project)
